title: Crew Show (CT5-V BlackWing, weird Mini, S3 trip, Q&A)
description:
We've driven a lot since our last sit down. We just reviewed the new Cadillac CT5-V BlackWing and another crazy Mini Cooper from Gildred Racing; Matt completed his road trip in the Audi S3; and Zack went drifting...sort of. 
 

Plus we answer fan questions about blank-check builds, used vs new parts, SUV dailies, Lucid vs S-Class, and more.

Follow us:

@thesmokingtire

@fakezackklapman

 

Watch our car reviews at https://www.youtube.com/thesmokingtire

Find Valvoline now at your local auto parts store.

 

Go to https://www.blackvue.com/TST and use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dash cam. Free shipping for orders over $200.

 

To get your new wireless plan for just 15 bucks a month, and get the plan shipped to your door for free, go to https://www.mintmobile.com/tire  

 

This show was recorded on 1/11/2021. Patreon members got to watch the live stream, and our Pro Driver tier patrons have been able to watch or listen to this episode since the day we recorded it. Want to watch a live-stream, listen ad-free, or get early access? Join our Patreon. https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
